champ_0130_ground_01: Hey hey! Rika here, at your service![npcn:13]
champ_0130_ground_02:
These Gyms really aren’t givin’ you much
trouble, are they?[npcn:13]
champ_0130_ground_03: Huh? Oh, right... You two haven’t met, have you?[npcn:13]
champ_0130_ground_05:
[H;Sh:g]e’s so good with Pokémon, even La Primera’s
taken an interest in h[im;er:g]![npcn:13]
champ_0130_steel_03:
B-but I think the Pokémon on Team Poppy are
really strong, too.\c
Like, REALLY strong![npcn:14]
champ_0130_ground_06: Which one of you is stronger, do you think?[npcn:13]
champ_0130_steel_05: I’m one of the Elite Four! So I’m more amazing![npcn:14]
champ_0130_ground_07: Ahahahahaha! Now aren’t you just adorable![npcn:13]
champ_0130_ground_08:
I know it’s hard to believe, but this tiny little one
is indeed one of the Elite Four.[npcn:13]
champ_0130_steel_07a:
I hope I get to show you my Pokémon
soon, mister![npcn:14]
champ_0130_steel_07b: I hope I get to show you my Pokémon soon, miss![npcn:14]
champ_0130_steel_08:
So hurry up and come to the Pokémon League!
It’s where the, um...pinnacle! It’s where the\r
pinnacle of Pokémon battling happens!\r
See you there![npcn:14]
champ_0130_ground_10:
Well, you keep up the good work! You heard the
kid—she’s waiting for you![npcn:13]
champ_0130_ground_11:
Wait up, Poppy! Don’t leave your pal Rika
behind![npcn:13]
